title: Territory Lord: Build Immortal Realm From Scratch

description:
Description :
        Territory Lord: Build Immortal Realm from ScratchEveryone can become a cultivator, everyone can become a g**! This is an era of cultivators of the whole people and an era of cultivators, gods and myths which are not just stories! The male protagonist Wu Chi travels through the parallel world, stepping into this passionate world where everyone is fighting! With the mysterious treasure in hand, he can change all the buildings in his territory! Also able to summon mythical characters and start a harem!
